summary:
*DawnGuard REQUIRED*
Adds 7 custom arrows , a bow & a dagger w/sheath; does not replace vanilla weapons
All craftable under DRAGON, no smithing perk required
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=red][b]DawnGuard REQUIRED[/b][/color][/center]

This mod adds effects and power \"tweaks\" to 7 new arrow types, a bow & a dagger w/sheath with stand-alone textures/meshes that do not alter your vanilla weapons. The arrows are craftable at any forge under the \"DRAGON\" category.
Included are Heroic Dwarven, Glass, Ebony, Daedric, Enchanted Dragonborn, Stealth & Silver arrows. Please check out the screenshots & video clips to see\'em in action.

[center][youtube]QiLwevS9odE[/youtube][/center]

This plugin has been gone over with TES5Edit 3.0.26 with no issues found. Should work anywhere in your load order.

Installation/uninstall
-Use Nexus Mod Manager to install and uninstall

Manual installation
-unzip the contents to your Skyrim/Data directory

Manual uninstall
Delete the following files from your skyrim directory:
 \\Data\\highimpactarrows.esp
 \\Data\\highimpactarrows.bsa
 
Stealth -  34.5 damage w/ silent explosion of absorb health 25 over 5 seconds
Daedric - 36 damage + a fiery explosion for another 20 damage
Dwarven - 28 base damage + oil trap explosion 8 damage
Ebony - 32 base damage + explosion illusion darklight 15 damage; soultrap
Glass - 22 + shock explosion 15 damage
silver - 18 damage + silver arrow enchantment & explosion for another 10
Dragonborn - 36 base damage + forceball explosion; 25 damage; w/ stagger & stamina damage

Dragonborn bow & Dagger enchanted w/ absorb health & damage stamina

[center][youtube]BkoxiPDm2R8[/youtube][/center]
          
The silver arrow is my retexture of the steel arrow.
The stealth arrow is my retexture of the DawnGuard dragonbone arrow.
The Dragonborn Bow is my retexture of the ebony bow.
The Dragonborn Dagger is my retexture of the DawnGuard dragonbone dagger.

All other textures/meshes included in this mod are the property of their respective creators. Please check their permissions before using any of the textures or meshes.

Heroic Dwarven Arrow - Textures courtesy of mgbeach:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4818

Glass Arrow textures courtesy of mgbeach:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4063

Ebony Arrow textures courtesy of mgbeach:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4091

Daedric Arrow with Glowing Rings mesh courtesy of pauderek:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17146

Dragonborn arrow - Ebony arrow retexture by Astralstonekeeper:
http://astralstonekeeper.deviantart.com
author: scrapperrm
